{"id":533350566,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1628105176,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/533350566/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"89.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double kth(vector<int>& A, vector<int>& B, int al, int ar, int bl, int br, int k) {\n        if (al > ar) {\n            return B[bl + k-1];\n        }\n        if (bl > br) {\n            return A[al + k-1];\n        }\n        if (k == 1) {\n            return min(A[al], B[bl]);\n        }\n        int step = k/2;\n        int amid = min(step, (ar - al+1));\n        int bmid = min(step, (br - bl+1));\n        \n        if (A[al + amid-1] >= B[bl + bmid-1]) {\n            return kth(A, B, al, ar, bl + bmid, br, k - bmid);\n        }\n        return kth(B, A, bl, br, al, ar, k);\n    }\n    \n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& a, vector<int>& b) {\n        int la = a.size();\n        int lb = b.size();\n        double m1 = kth(a, b, 0, la-1, 0, lb-1, (la + lb)/2+1);\n        if ((la + lb) % 2 == 0) {\n            return (m1 + kth(a, b, 0, la-1, 0, lb-1, (la + lb)/2))/2.0;\n        }\n        return m1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays"}
